reference.title: Security Tips
reference.shortdesc: This guide is dedicated to maximize the security of your wallet.

section.title: Tips for better security
section.p: In order to achieve greater security of your CryptoGuard wallet, please remember to implement and follow the major security principles listed below:

ol.li: DO NOT give your password to anyone!
DO NOT call any phone number of someone claiming to be a CryptoGuard employee or from the Support teamÔºÅ
DO NOT send money to anyone claiming to be a CryptoGuard employee!
Enable Two Factor Authentication (either Google Authenticator or SMS Authentication).
DO NOT share your private keys with anyone!
Make transactions only if you trust the person you are sending money to!
